name: Pearly Shine
description: Customised and inspired by shipwrecked jewellery, A gorgeous oyster gold colour necklace with painted on pearl. It has a fine chain so it doesn't irritate you through the sunny weather! Gold in colour, this delicate piece will be the finishing touch to your outfit! 2 in stock! All orders come in a bubblewrap envolope, wrapped in green tissue, with either a sticker or magnet!

name: Dropped Below Bracelet
description: Customised and inspired by shipwrecked jewellery, this gorgeous bracelet features 4 striking charms, 6 faux pearls and a T bar clasp. Bronze in colour, it's hot for this summer, and will be that perfect statement piece for finishing your perfect summer outfit! Only 1 in stock! All orders come in a bubblewrap envolope, wrapped in green tissue, with either a sticker or magnet!

name: Postage options: International Postage and UK Signed for delivery.
description:
This option is for you so you can feel assured your package will arrive with you! 

International postage: Please select one of the options that apply to you below when you purchase a product. If no postage is selected you will be refunded and prompted to re-order. £8 = $6

Signed for delivery: It is not needed to shop here, but if you'd like this delivery option please add this to your basket. We have a flatrate for this at £4 (Which can cover the whole of the UK + Ireland).
